solution_line_template: After spending money on a shirt, Lily had ${initial_balance} - ${shirt_cost} = $<<{initial_balance}-{shirt_cost}={after_shirt}>>{after_shirt} left.
She spent ${shirt_cost} x {times_shirt_cost} = $<<{shirt_cost}*{times_shirt_cost}={other_store_spent}>>{other_store_spent} on another store.
Therefore, she only has ${after_shirt} - ${other_store_spent} = $<<{after_shirt}-{other_store_spent}={final_balance}>>{final_balance} left on her account.
